rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reinforced concrete finish. Designed to reflect the Brutalist aesthetic and incorporate Vastu principles, ensuring proper north-south orientation for energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Area & Courtyard Access
rooms.description: Open plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side facing the central courtyard. This space is connected directly to the courtyard, encouraging natural light and ventilation while adhering to Vastu guidelines for auspicious spatial arrangement.

rooms.name: Dining & Kitchen Area
rooms.description: Functional dining and kitchen area with a Brutalist style design. The area includes integrated workstations and storage, ensuring a balance between aesthetic harshness and warm interior lighting as per Vastu recommendations for prosperity.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Room/Studio
rooms.description: Large studio space that can be adapted to various uses such as work or creative activities. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide abundant natural light and a connection to the garden, aligning with both Brutalist design principles and Vastu's emphasis on clarity and openness.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Reinforced concrete door ensuring durability and security, designed to be aligned properly according to Vastu for positive energy flow.

openings.name: East Facing Window
openings.description: Large floor-to-ceiling window facing the garden, providing ample natural light and ventilation. Designed to meet both Brutalist aesthetic and Vastu guidelines for brightness.

openings.name: Courtyard Entrance
openings.description: Door connecting the living area directly to the central courtyard, fostering a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces in line with sustainable design principles.
